item.title: 泰晤士水务债务危机：会被国有化吗？账单会受到影响吗？
item.description: 英国最大的供水和污水处理供应商泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water）陷入困境。巨大的财务漏洞正威胁着该公司的临时国有化，可能会给当前或未来的政府带来巨大的麻烦。以下是关于泰晤士水务公司如何陷入困境、如果公司倒闭会发生什么以及这一切对客户意味着什么的解释。【原文：The UK’s largest water and sewage supplier Thames Water is in trouble. A huge hole in its finances is threatening to drive the company to temporary nationalization, potentially creating a big problem for current or future governments. Here’s an explainer of how Thames Water came to be in this position, what could happen if the company collapses and what it all means for customers.】

item.title: 担心通胀，南非利率全年保持不变
item.description: 金融期货市场的押注显示，由于通货膨胀持续存在，南非央行今年不会降息，甚至有可能加息。【原文：South Africa’s central bank won’t cut interest rates this year because of persistent inflation and there’s even a risk it could raise them, bets in financial futures markets show.】

item.title: 苏富比罕见债券将获得伦勃朗和沃霍尔艺术品的支持
item.description: 据知情人士透露，与伦勃朗-凡-里恩和安迪-沃霍尔的艺术品相关的贷款，是苏富比金融服务公司（Sotheby's Financial Services）将捆绑成不寻常的 5 亿美元债券的资产之一。【原文：Loans tied to art from Rembrandt van Rijn and Andy Warhol are among the assets being bundled into an unusual $500 million bond from Sotheby’s Financial Services, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 特许金融分析师（CFA）期末考试通过率升至 49%，低于十年平均水平
item.description: 特许金融分析师最后一级考试的通过率低于十年来的平均水平，而首次参加考试的考生的成功率要高于那些选择推迟考试的考生。【原文：The pass rate for the final level of the chartered financial analyst exam stayed below the decade average, while first-time test takers had a higher success rate than those who chose to delay testing.】

item.title: 欧洲央行维持利率不变并确定 6 月首次降息的路径
item.description: 欧洲中央银行在第五次会议上保持利率稳定，同时发出了迄今为止最明确的信号，即通胀降温将很快允许其开始削减利率。【原文：The European Central Bank held interest rates steady for a fifth meeting, while sending its clearest signal yet that cooling inflation will soon allow it to commence cuts.】

item.title: 可可价格连续第五天攀升，供应紧张的痛苦依然存在
item.description: 可可期货连续第五天上涨，原因是预计未来几个月供应将更加紧张，从而将价格推高至接近创纪录的水平。【原文：Cocoa futures rallied for a fifth day as expected tighter supplies in the coming months push prices to near record levels.】

item.title: 欧佩克称夏季需求旺盛 石油需密切监控
item.description: 欧佩克（OPEC）在其月度石油市场报告中表示，未来几个月需要密切关注石油市场，以确保在预期需求激增期间实现 "稳健和可持续的市场平衡"。【原文：Oil will need to be closely watched in the coming months to ensure “a sound and sustainable market balance” during an expected surge in demand, OPEC said in its monthly oil market report.】

item.title: 石油涨势推动得克萨斯州汽油价格跌破零点
item.description:
生产商正在启用更多油井，为过剩的市场火上浇油。【原文：

Producers are bringing more wells online, adding fuel to a glutted market.

】

item.title: 优衣库将欧洲视为实现 10 万亿日元目标的关键市场
item.description: 优衣库的所有者 Fast Retailing Co. 将欧洲视为该品牌的主要增长市场，并表示该地区的年销售额最终将达到 1 万亿日元（65 亿美元）。【原文：Fast Retailing Co., the owner of Uniqlo, sees Europe as a key growth market for the brand and said annual sales in the region could eventually reach ¥1 trillion ($6.5 billion).】

item.title: Moderna 在肯尼亚亏损 10 亿美元后暂停 mRNA 工厂计划
item.description: Moderna 公司在周四的一份声明中表示，在确定非洲大陆未来对 Covid-19 疫苗需求的同时，该公司已暂停在肯尼亚建设 mRNA 生产设施的工作。【原文：Moderna Inc. has paused its efforts to build an mRNA manufacturing facility in Kenya while it determines future demand for Covid-19 vaccines on the African continent, the firm said in a statement Thursday.】

item.title: 交易商押注泰晤士河水务公司重组，大举买入廉价债券
item.description: 据知情人士透露，基金经理们正在买入交易价格远低于面值的泰晤士河水务公司债券，押注潜在重组带来的任何减值都不会像目前的交易水平所显示的那么痛苦。【原文：Money managers are buying up Thames Water bonds that are trading well below their face value, betting that any haircut from a potential restructuring will prove less painful than current trading levels indicate, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 马克龙面临收视率下滑的危险，预算压力增大
item.description: 法国的信用评级有可能被下调，这使埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统面临的挑战更加严峻，因为他不得不在 6 月欧盟大选前的这段时间里兼顾预算。【原文：The danger of a cut to France’s credit rating is adding to the challenges facing President Emmanuel Macron as he’s forced to juggle his budget in the run-up to June’s European Union elections.】

item.title: 摩根大通分析师称 2015 年以来首次买入 M&S 股票
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）分析师近十年来首次转而看好玛莎集团（Marks & Spencer Group Plc），因为这家英国零售商正在赢得服装市场份额。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. analysts turned bullish on Marks & Spencer Group Plc for the first time in almost a decade as the British retailer wins market share in clothing.】

item.title: 中国村镇银行就超长期债券投资发出警告
item.description: 一些地区的中国村镇银行已被建议限制其对超长期主权债券的风险敞口，此举可能会导致这些证券近期的涨势被平仓。【原文：Chinese rural banks in a number of regions have been advised to limit their exposure to ultra-long sovereign bonds, a move that may lead to unwinding of the recent rally in these securities.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司海上消费热潮推动石油钻井平台债券反弹
item.description: 由于巴西石油公司（Petroleo Brasileiro SA）对该公司海上钻井平台的需求增加，Constellation Oil Services Holding SA 的债券持有人正在收获一笔意外之财。【原文：Constellation Oil Services Holding SA’s bondholders are reaping a windfall due to increased demand for the company’s offshore rigs from Petroleo Brasileiro SA, a sharp recovery for a business that emerged from a debt restructuring less than two years ago.】

item.title: 安联首席经济学家称欧洲央行减息次数过多可能令市场恐慌
item.description: 安联集团（Allianz）首席经济学家路德维克-苏伯兰（Ludovic Subran）认为，如果欧洲央行的利率政策与美国央行的利率政策相去甚远，那么欧洲央行将面临投资者反弹的风险。【原文：The European Central Bank risks a backlash from investors if its interest-rate policy strays too far from that of its US counterpart, according to Allianz Chief Economist Ludovic Subran.】

item.title: 津巴布韦总督表示，津巴布韦将以 ZiG 和美元公布通货膨胀率
item.description: 津巴布韦中央银行行长约翰-穆沙亚万胡表示，津巴布韦统计机构将开始以津巴布韦元和美元两种货币发布消费者价格数据。【原文：Zimbabwe’s statistics agency will start publishing consumer-price data in both ZiG and US dollars, central bank Governor John Mushayavanhu said.】

item.title: 俄罗斯袭击乌克兰天然气储存地，推动天然气价格上涨
item.description: 俄罗斯周四袭击了乌克兰的两个地下天然气储存设施，对该国的能源基础设施和供应安全构成了新的威胁。【原文：Russia attacked two Ukrainian underground gas storage facilities Thursday in a fresh threat to the country’s energy infrastructure and supply security.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。随着交易员推后美联储降息的押注，债券交易员为不降息的可能性做好准备，美国通胀数据的热度继续在市场上掀起波澜。以下是市场动向。【原文：Good morning. The impact of hot US inflation data continues to ripple through markets as traders push back Fed rate-cut bets and bond traders position for the possibility of no reductions at all. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 南非迫在眉睫的政治动荡令投资者提心吊胆
item.description: 南非正迈向未知的政治领域，投资者日益焦虑不安。【原文：South Africa is heading into unchartered political terrain and investors are growing increasingly anxious.】

item.title: 巴斯夫或因繁文缛节裁减电池材料厂所有岗位
item.description: 巴斯夫公司（BASF SE）正在权衡裁减其芬兰电池材料工厂的所有工人，该工厂因繁文缛节和环保组织的反对而停工多年。【原文：BASF SE is weighing to lay off every worker at its Finnish battery materials plant that’s been held up for years by red tape and opposition from environmental groups.】

item.title: 波兰炼油厂为从未收到的原油支付 4 亿美元
item.description: 波兰最大的炼油商表示，由于其瑞士贸易部门已付款但从未收到石油，该公司将核销约 4 亿美元。【原文：Poland’s largest refiner said it will take a write-off equating to about $400 million as a result of oil that its Swiss trading unit paid for but never received.】

item.title: 匈牙利推迟 19 亿美元投资以控制赤字
item.description: 匈牙利财政部长米哈里-瓦尔加（Mihaly Varga）周四表示，匈牙利将推迟一些国家投资，以阻止预算赤字超过已经提高的目标。【原文：Hungary will postpone some state investments in a bid to stop the budget deficit from exceeding an already raised target, Finance Minister Mihaly Varga said Thursday.】

item.title: 美国最昂贵的住房市场意外反弹
item.description: 乍一看，史蒂夫-希尔顿不太可能是美国中产阶级房主的拥护者。【原文：At first glance Steve Hilton is an unlikely champion of America’s middle-class homeowner.】

item.title: UnitedHealth 董事长和高管在美国调查公开前售出 1.02 亿美元股票
item.description: 联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group Inc.董事长斯蒂芬-赫姆斯利（Stephen Hemsley）和三名高管在公众知晓联邦反垄断调查之前的四个月内出售股票，共净赚 1.015 亿美元。【原文：UnitedHealth Group Inc. Chairman Stephen Hemsley and three senior executives netted a combined $101.5 million from stock sales made over four months leading up to when the public became aware of a federal antitrust investigation.】

item.title: 税收截止日期对资金市场和美联储资产负债表至关重要
item.description: 华尔街分析师认为，随着 4 月份纳税截止日期的临近，美国融资市场出现混乱的风险也在增加。【原文：As April’s tax deadline nears, so does the risk of disruptions in US funding markets, according to Wall Street analysts.】

item.title: 中国中广核新能源母公司被指将重启私有化计划
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中广核新能源控股有限公司（CGN New Energy Holdings Co.【原文：CGN New Energy Holdings Co.’s parent is considering taking the Hong Kong-listed power producer private after abandoning a previous plan more than three years ago, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 由于缺乏可可豆，加纳寻求推迟可可的交付
item.description: 由于缺乏可可豆，加纳正在与贸易商商谈将至少 15 万吨至 25 万吨可可的交货时间推迟到下一季，这是供应紧张如何扰乱全球市场的最新迹象。【原文：Ghana is in talks with traders to postpone the delivery of at least 150,000 to 250,000 tons of cocoa until next season due to a lack of beans, in the latest sign of how a supply crunch is roiling the global market.】

item.title: 新兴市场货币受韩国和美联储影响抹去四月涨幅
item.description: 新兴市场货币周四走软，抹去了本月的涨幅，原因是美国通胀数据热于预期，令风险偏好降低。中东地区的紧张局势和韩国大选后韩元走软也对该指数造成了影响。【原文：Emerging-market currencies weakened on Thursday, erasing this month’s gains, as hotter-than-expected US inflation data soured risk appetite. Tension in the Middle East and the weakening of the won after South Korea’s elections also weighed on the index.】
